title: Lemon Garlic Herb Chicken
short_description: A delightful, healthy chicken breast dish with a zesty lemon and herb flavor, perfect for a moderation reference.

steps.title: Prepare Chicken
steps.description: Pat the chicken dry with paper towels and season both sides with salt, pepper, and half of the dried herbs.

steps.title: Marinate
steps.description: In a small bowl, mix olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, and the remaining dried herbs. Cover the chicken with the mixture and set aside to marinate for the next 10 minutes.

steps.title: Cook
steps.description: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Sear the chicken on both sides until golden, about 3-4 minutes each side.

steps.title: Finish up
steps.description: Reduce the heat to medium-low, cover, and let it cook for another 7-10 minutes, or until the chicken is thoroughly cooked. Serve with lemon slices on top.
